adHeader: Selling Your Home? Want an HONEST opinion?
adDetails: If you are thinking of selling your home, call me show contact info I will not throw a high number at you so you want to list your home with me. I will show you statistics and together we will come up with a great price to list your home at. No pressure! I truly do love my career as a real estate agent. I enjoy working for my clients and seeing the look on their face when they sell their home and/or purchase their new home. It is a real blessed moment not everyone gets to experience. I am dedicated to my career, my clients and serving them to the best of my ability. Honesty, Trust and Reliability are very important to me to give to and recieve from my clients. Megan Sousa Artisan Sotheby's International Realty show contact info
